function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing remote collaboration and reducing in-person meetings.","Technologies":"Video conferencing, collaborative software tools.","People":"Researchers, analysts, and stakeholders involved in data analysis.","Owner":"Research team, project managers."},{"Description":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures and cleaning protocols for shared facilities.","Technologies":"Smart sanitation technologies, contactless entry systems.","People":"Researchers, analysts, and support staff using shared facilities.","Owner":"Facility management, research team."}]}
